Title: Invictus
Actors: Morgan Freeman, Matt Damon, Tony Kgoroge, Patrick Mofokeng
Plot: Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman), in his first term as President of South African, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.
Language: English, Afrikaans, Maori, Zulu, Xhosa, Southern Sotho
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 33 nominations.
